meanings.definition: The state of being far away in space or time.
meanings.sent1: The distantness of the stars in the night sky amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: The distantness of the past makes it hard to remember exact details.
meanings.sent3: The distantness of the finish line motivated the runners to sprint faster.
meanings.sent4: The distantness of the mountains gave the landscape a mysterious allure.
meanings.sent5: The distantness of the train whistle signaled its approach from afar.

meanings.definition: The quality of being emotionally or physically detached.
meanings.sent1: Her distantness in the meeting made it hard for others to connect with her.
meanings.sent2: The distantness in his voice indicated he was lost in thought.
meanings.sent3: The distantness of the robot's interactions with humans was both eerie and fascinating.
meanings.sent4: The distantness of the island from the mainland created a sense of isolation.
meanings.sent5: The distantness of her gaze hinted at a deep inner contemplation.
